mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_report_input ( input_date, mch_code, mch_name, gb, visc, pre_temp, heat_temp, liq_temp, sg ) VALUES ( #{s_time}, #{m_code}, #{mch_name}, #{gb}, #{visc}, #{pre_temp}, #{heat_temp}, #{liq_temp}, #{sg} )

INSERT INTO tb_report_input ( idx, input_date, mch_code, mch_name, gb, visc, pre_temp, heat_temp, liq_temp, sg ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{input_date}, #{mch_code}, #{mch_name}, #{gb}, #{visc}, #{pre_temp}, #{heat_temp}, #{liq_temp}, #{sg} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE input_date = VALUES(input_date), mch_code = VALUES(mch_code), mch_name = VALUES(mch_name), gb = VALUES(gb), visc = VALUES(visc), pre_temp = VALUES(pre_temp), heat_temp = VALUES(heat_temp), liq_temp = VALUES(liq_temp), sg = VALUES(sg)
mapper.select: SELECT facility_name, mach_code, std_weight, c_t, aa, bb, work_day, set_hr, mok_hr, capa_day, '1' AS day_ton, 1 / capa_day AS percent_day, 1 - capa_day AS bujok_day, work_month / capa_day AS capa_month, work_day / capa_day AS capa_sum, '1' AS cc, '1' AS dd, '1' AS ee FROM ( SELECT mach_code, facility_name, std_weight, (3600 / (c_t / work_time)) AS c_t, 1 AS aa, 1 AS bb, work_day, work_month, work_day * 24 AS set_hr, work_day * 24 AS mok_hr, ((work_day * 24) * 3600) / c_t * std_weight / work_day / 1000 AS capa_day FROM ( SELECT mach_code, MAX(facility_name) AS facility_name, SUM(tong) AS tong, ROUND(SUM(weight), 0) AS weight, SUM(tong_day) AS tong_day, MAX(work_day) AS work_day, MAX(work_month) AS work_month, ROUND(SUM(weight_day), 0) AS weight_day, MAX(work_time) AS work_time, MAX(c_t) AS c_t, MAX(capa) AS capa, MAX(std_weight) AS std_weight FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mach_code, weight, 1 AS tong, CASE WHEN 1=1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS tong_day, CASE WHEN 1=1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} THEN weight ELSE 0 END AS weight_day, CASE WHEN CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS SIGNED) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS SIGNED) END AS work_time, CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m01080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS SIGNED) AS work_day, DAY(LAST_DAY(NOW())) AS work_month, fac.c_t, fac.capa, fac.std_weight, fac.facility_name, LEAD(start_time) OVER (PARTITION BY mach_code, barcode_no ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS next_start_time FROM tb_lowdata_save AS lows INNER JOIN tb_facility AS fac ON lows.mach_code = fac.facility_mach_code WHERE 1=1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} AND weight IS NOT NULL AND start_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL ) AS A WHERE next_start_time IS NULL ) AS low GROUP BY mach_code ) AS AA ) AS BB

SELECT work_time, tong, (work_time * tong) / 2 AS a1, (work_time * tong) AS a2, non_time AS a3, (work_time - non_time) AS a4, (tong * (work_time - non_time)) AS a5, tong_day, tong_night, (tong_day + tong_night) AS tong_sum, ((tong_day + tong_night) / (work_time * tong)) AS a6, ((tong_day + tong_night) / (tong * (work_time - non_time))) AS a7, ((tong_day + tong_night) - (work_time * tong)) AS a8, ((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) AS a9, ((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) AS a10, (((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) * std_weight / 1000) AS a10, (((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) / tong) AS a11, (((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) / tong) / 60 AS a12, ((((tong_day + tong_night) - (tong * (work_time - non_time))) / tong) / 60) / ((work_time - non_time) * 60) AS a13, facility_name FROM ( SELECT mach_code, MAX(facility_name) AS facility_name, SUM(tong) AS tong, ROUND(SUM(weight), 0) AS weight, SUM(tong_day) AS tong_day, SUM(tong_night) AS tong_night, MAX(work_day) AS work_day, ROUND(SUM(weight_day), 0) AS weight_day, MAX(work_time) AS work_time, MAX(c_t) AS c_t, MAX(capa) AS capa, MAX(std_weight) AS std_weight, 1 AS non_time FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT mach_code, weight, 1 AS tong, (CASE WHEN 1 = 1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tong_day, (CASE WHEN 1 = 1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS tong_night, (CASE WHEN 1 = 1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} THEN weight ELSE 0 END) AS weight_day, CASE WHEN CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS INTEGER) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS INTEGER) END AS work_time, CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m01080000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), NOW()) AS INTEGER) AS work_day, fac.c_t, fac.capa, fac.std_weight, fac.facility_name, LEAD(start_time) OVER(PARTITION BY mach_code, barcode_no ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS next_start_time FROM tb_lowdata_save AS lows INNER JOIN tb_facility AS fac ON lows.mach_code = fac.facility_mach_code WHERE 1 = 1 AND end_time >= #{s_time} AND end_time <= #{e_time} AND weight IS NOT NULL AND start_time IS NOT NULL AND end_time IS NOT NULL ) AS A WHERE next_start_time IS NULL ) AS low GROUP BY mach_code ) AS B;
